Connie.title: Connie's First Entry
Connie.body:
Hi!

This blogging platform is awesome because you can use Markdown. It also uses DOMPurify to prevent XSS attacks!

You can use:

  • Lists!
  • Text formatting!
  • and many more...
let x = "Code blocks";
let y = "are supported too!"
let x = "(the preview is scrollable :))"

Connie.title: Monday 25.2.19
Connie.body: Today was a good day. John told me his secret code: S2l3aS5jb20=
